001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
005
006import java.util.Map;
007
008@Regularization.Target(Regularization.Target.Type.WEIGHTS)
009@Regularization.Effect({Regularization.Effect.Type.SPARSITY, Regularization.Effect.Type.SHRINKAGE})
010public class ElasticNet<N extends Number> implements ExplicitRegularization<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
011
012    public static String HP_LAMBDA_1 = "lambda1";
013    public static String HP_LAMBDA_2 = "lambda2";
014
015    private final LASSO<N> lasso;
016    private final Ridge<N> ridge;
017
018    public ElasticNet(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
019        this(new LASSO<>(typeSupport), new Ridge<>(typeSupport));
020    }
021
022    private ElasticNet(LASSO<N> lasso, Ridge<N> ridge) {
023        this.lasso = lasso;
024        this.ridge = ridge;
025    }
026
027    @Override
028    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getCurrentNumberType() {
029        return lasso.getCurrentNumberType();
030    }
031
032    public N getLambda1() {
033        return lasso.getLambda();
034    }
035
036    public void setLambda1(N lambda1) {
037        lasso.setLambda(lambda1);
038    }
039
040    public N getLambda2() {
041        return ridge.getLambda();
042    }
043
044    public void setLambda2(N lambda2) {
045        ridge.setLambda(lambda2);
046    }
047
048    public N lossPenalty(N[] parameters) {
049        N loss1 = lasso.lossPenalty(parameters);
050        N loss2 = ridge.lossPenalty(parameters);
051        return getCurrentNumberType().add(loss1, loss2);
052    }
053
054    public N gradientAdjustment(N parameter) {
055        N grad1 = lasso.gradientAdjustment(parameter);
056        N grad2 = ridge.gradientAdjustment(parameter);
057        return getCurrentNumberType().add(grad1, grad2);
058    }
059
060    @Override
061    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
062        return Map.of(HP_LAMBDA_1, getLambda1(), HP_LAMBDA_2, getLambda2());
063    }
064
065    @Override
066    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
067        if (HP_LAMBDA_1.equals(name)) {
068            setLambda1(getCurrentNumberType().cast(value));
069        } else if (HP_LAMBDA_2.equals(name)) {
070            setLambda2(getCurrentNumberType().cast(value));
071        }
072    }
073}
